vclaim: In March 2019, U.S. Education Secretary Betsy DeVos proposed eliminating a near-$18 million grant for Special Olympics programs.
title: Did U.S. Education Secretary Betsy DeVos Announce Plans to Cut $18 Million in Funding for the Special Olympics?
subtitle: The controversial federal official came under renewed scrutiny in March 2019 for her department's 2020 budget request.
author: Dan MacGuill
